worldhdi 0.1.0

worldhdi: Human Development Index 1990-2022

worldhdi.Rd

Trends in Human Development Index worldwide by country from 1990-2022. Data is initially measured at a frequency of once every 10 years, then 5 years and then yearly from 2019 onwards.

Usage

worldhdi

Format

A tibble with 195 rows and 17 variables

hdi_rank

World Rank in Human Development Index as of 2022

country

Official name of the country

hdi_1990

HDI in 1990

hdi_2000

HDI in 2000

hdi_2010

HDI in 2010

hdi_2015

HDI in 2015

hdi_2019

HDI in 2019

hdi_2020

HDI in 2020

hdi_2021

HDI in 2021

hdi_2022

HDI in 2022

rank_change_2015_2022

Change in rank from 2015 to 2022

avg_growth_1990_2000

Average annual growth in country's HDI between 1990-2000

avg_growth_2000_2010

Average annual growth in country's HDI between 2000-2010

avg_growth_2010_2022

Average annual growth in country's HDI between 2010-2022

avg_growth_1990_2022

Average annual growth in country's HDI between 1990-2022

hdi_tier

HDI Tier as defined by UNDP Very high [0.8-1.0), High [0.7 - 0.8), Medium [0.55-0.7), Low (<0.55)

iso3c

ISO3 code for the country
